00049

00106 class _MLHom {
00109   mutable int refCounter;
00114   mutable bool marking;
00115 
00117   friend class MLHom;
00118 
00120   virtual void mark() const{};
00121 
00122   
00123 public:
00124   _MLHom (int ref=0) : refCounter(ref),marking(false) {}
00126   virtual bool shouldCache () const { return true ; }
00127 
00129   virtual ~_MLHom(){};
00130   virtual HomNodeMap eval(const GDDD &) const = 0;
00131 
00133   virtual size_t hash() const = 0;
00134   virtual bool operator==(const _MLHom &h) const=0;
00135   // for use by unique table : return new MyConcreteClassName(*this);

00138 };
